p: Neutralizing antibodies against nCoV 19 surface antigens block virus entry, of which S protein considered a good candidate. These monoclonal neutralizing antibodies provide passive immunity in the time of exposure like palivizumab as a putative model that has been applied for the prevention of RSV infection. Anti-inflammatory antibodies like anti IL6 receptor (Tocilizumab) and anti ITGA4 (Natalizumab) may repress inflammation and cellular extravasation [ 78].
